items.sentence: Tom had changed so much that I didn\'t even recognize him.
The reason that happened was because you weren\'t careful.
I\'m still not used to getting up so early in the morning.
I\'ve made up my mind to work for a company in the States.
If I had a dime for every time I heard that, I\'d be rich.
Tom wanted to make sure that nothing bad happened to Mary.
Tom wanted to talk to Mary about what was going to happen.
Tom wants to find a place to live close to where he works.
Tom was a truck driver before he became a race car driver.
I don\'t know anybody who hasn\'t been sick at least once.
